verses.name: Proverbs 24:23
verses.text: These things also belong to the wise. It is not good to have respect of persons in judgment.

verses.name: Proverbs 24:24
verses.text: He that saith unto the wicked, Thou art righteous; him shall the people curse, nations shall abhor him:

verses.name: Proverbs 24:25
verses.text: But to them that rebuke him shall be delight, and a good blessing shall come upon them.

verses.name: Proverbs 24:26
verses.text: Every man shall kiss his lips that giveth a right answer.

verses.name: Proverbs 24:27
verses.text: Prepare thy work without, and make it fit for thyself in the field; and afterwards build thine house.

verses.name: Proverbs 24:28
verses.text: Be not a witness against thy neighbour without cause; and deceive not with thy lips.
